thread.title: See All The Wonderful Things The Film Fraternity Had To Say To Karan Johar, On Becoming A Father
thread.title_full: See All The Wonderful Things The Film Fraternity Had To Say To Karan Johar, On Becoming A Father

title: See All The Wonderful Things The Film Fraternity Had To Say To Karan Johar, On Becoming A Father
text:
facebook 
Yesterday morning, we all awoke to the unexpected, but extremely joyful, news that Karan Johar became father to twins through surrogacy . And we couldn't contain our excitement at this monumental new development in the filmmaker's life, neither could his friends from the film industry. From Priyanka Chopra to Vishal Dadlani, everyone from the film fraternity, had only the best things to say to Karan on the new additions to his family. Take a look at all their messages, here. Konkona Sensharma â€” Konkona Sensharma (@konkonas) March 5, 2017 Arjun Rampal @karanjohar Congratulations Karan, this is the best news in years. You will make an amazing parent. Love to the little ones. God bless. â€” arjun rampal (@rampalarjun) March 5, 2017 Varun Dhawan Karan your the best human being I know and Im sure you will make the best dad.Can't wait to meet these lil munchkins https://t.co/iDl4XswvRG â€” Varun Badri Dhawan (@Varun_dvn) March 5, 2017 Sushant Singh Rajput I'd such a big smile this morning when I read about this.Lots and lots of love @karanjohar and a big hearty congratulations. https://t.co/sfksLcoRUu â€” Sushant Singh Rajput (@itsSSR) March 5, 2017 Alia Bhatt Finally I can say I have a younger brother AND sister So so so happyâ¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸ soo much love to give uff bursting with joy https://t.co/HCMkoR5JWL â€” Alia Bhatt (@aliaa08) March 5, 2017 Priyanka Chopra Congratulations @karanjohar so happy for you. May Yash and Roohi always have a beautiful healthy life. Much love alwaysâ¤ï¸ â€” PRIYANKA (@priyankachopra) March 5, 2017 Rahul Dev @karanjohar Congratulations Karan! With your sensitivity, u sure will make an amazing parent. Love to both of them ..God blessğŸ™ â€” Rahul Dev Official (@RahulDevRising) March 5, 2017 Vishal Dadlani Congrats, @karanjohar ! You'll make a wonderful parent. All it takes is a good heart (and lots of patience! ;) ). So I'm told, by mine! https://t.co/KNGNihBSEv â€” VISHAL DADLANI (@VishalDadlani) March 5, 2017 Riteish Deshmukh Heartiest Congratulations my dearest @karanjohar thrilled beyond words. love to lil angels Roohi & Yash & big big hug to Hiroo aunty ğŸ¥ğŸ·ğŸºğŸ‰ğŸŠğŸˆ https://t.co/BjwEe6vlSo â€” Riteish Deshmukh (@Riteishd) March 5, 2017 Sidharth Malhotra So happy you took this decision karan ! It's a full house now You will be an amazing father, love to your new big family ! ğŸ˜Š https://t.co/Du52UsjMcT â€” Sidharth Malhotra (@S1dharthM) March 5, 2017 Sonakshi Sinha This is so amazing @karanjohar !!! You will be the best daddy and spoil them silly im sure! Wish u and ur family a the happiness ğŸ˜˜ https://t.co/lVBjmu5dEP â€” Sonakshi Sinha (@sonakshisinha) March 5, 2017 Preity Zinta Congrats @karanjohar ğŸ˜˜â¤ï¸ğŸ˜˜ S happy for you & Hiroo Aunty. I'm sure Yash & Roohi will bring light & happiness to ur lives ğŸ˜lotza love â¤ï¸ â€” Preity zinta (@realpreityzinta) March 5, 2017 Divya Dutta @karanjohar god bless you ,Yash n roohi!!! Wishing u loads of happiness and a beautiful journey with ur little ones â€” Divya Dutta (@divyadutta25) March 5, 2017 Kapil Sharma @karanjohar n congratulations for ur family.. happy for u .. god bless u n ur family.. lots of love n blessings for Yash n roohi :))
